title: Topic 001 Question 191
body: A company has a compliance requirement to rotate its encryption keys on an annual basis. A Security Engineer needs a process to rotate the KMS Customer
Master Keys (CMKs) that were created using imported key material.
How can the Engineer perform the key rotation process MOST efficiently?
options: Create a new CMK, and redirect the existing Key Alias to the new CMK.
Select the option to auto-rotate the key.
Upload new key material into the existing CMK.
Create a new CMK, and change the application to point to the new CMK.
